body: Wtf i don't get it..did they have sex with the zombie? Who's that guy?
Don't give me spoilers about the manga aaaaaghhhhh
In the main manga kurumi already dead

@ZombieLegend the artist made it with legal viewing in mind so the only reason you would have picked this Doujin up to begin with was because you liked the artist or you know the source material. Since this is a illegal distribution site its nobody but the viewers fault for not knowing whats going on since "hey its free". But if you want context the source material is basically a zombie apocalypse involving a bunch of junior high girls and it focuses more on their psychological state (one is guilt ridden about their little sisters death that they get schizophrenia and ones delusional cus she snapped after seeing her dead classmates).
This is nice work. Goddamn Kurumi one of my waifus...

this story takes place during a zombie apocalypse. they take shelter in a school and have to do things like conserve water to stay alive
the second half the girls take shelter in an abandoned mall and they just have sex lol
??? isnt the context of a parody made with fans of the work in mind??
Retract part of my previous statement, partially. There should have been more context as to why.

This doujin is a perfect example of when a work requires more dialogue to make sense if people haven't seen the original work that it's based on. I have no fucking idea what went down, why, and when. Minus the shower part, that kinda made sense.
